changes: Added Validate() method to HiddenState struct
Added ValidDTypes slice to define allowed data types

patterns_discovered: Dimensional consistency check for vectors and shapes
gotchas_discovered: Shape length and vector length must match
DType must be from predefined set
Potential runtime errors if validation not performed
recommendations: Consider making Validate() method a standard pattern for structs with complex constraints
Add unit tests to verify each validation condition
Consider using an enum or typed constant for DTypes instead of string slice
